required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Omeprazole on PK of Fluzoparib in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: a Single-center, One-arm, Open, and Fixed Sequences Study to Evaluate the Effects of Omeprazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Fluzoparib in Healthy Male Volunteers

collaborator.agency: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the Effect of Omeprazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Fluzoparib in Healthy male Adults.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: repeated oral doses of Omeprazole on the pharmacokinetic profile of a single dose of Fluzoparib

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, up to 24 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From 0 to t of Fluzoparib:
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, up to 24 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From 0 to infinity of Fluzoparib:
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, up to 24 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of Adverse Events Assessments
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, up to 24 weeks

overall_official.affiliation: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

facility.name: The third xiangya hospital Hospital,of central south university
